name: Princess of Persia (SDLPoP-1.18.1 engine)
description:
Princess of Persia (SDLPoP-1.18.1 engine) - Planning custom levels to go with this nice custom mod - Also enabled all enhancements with the SDLPop to go with this.

Released in: 2015
PoP version: Prince of Persia 1
Description: Play as a princess! A new story, custom palace and dungeon graphics, some different sound effects and custom characters (father, level 6 guard, snake).
Starting time: 60 minutes
By: Clive Dent (jeminacek) (Author)
